UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The second N-terminal aromatic residue of the fungal defensin, blapersin, of Blastomyces percursus is essential for its antibacterial activity.
Literature.Author: Wu J, Qu C, Zhang S, Chen W, Wang S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:13% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:3% Killing=50 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus BNCC 337371(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus BNCC 340652(MIC=2µM),Bacillus cereus BNCC 103930(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis BNCC 109047 (MIC=4µM),Micrococcus luteus BNCC 102589(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=2µM),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=1µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(no activity data),Serratia marcescens ATCC 14756(no activity data)
